nodes.text: Brollo was a Gamorrean mercenary who worked for Jerec's division of the Imperial remnants in 5 ABY. He wore a bloodsucking morrt on each bicep as a symbol of status. He was stationed on Sulon to guard the Katarn house. His cousin was Blotho, who participated in fights that the Imperials and mercenaries would bet on.
Brollo was killed by Kyle Katarn with a blaster shot.
